H0.text: In the Harry Potter books there are 4 houses at Hogwarts School. Three of them are Gryffendor, Ravenclaw and Slytherin. Name the fourth.. Hufflepuff

H1.text: In the Harry Potter books there are 4 houses at Hogwarts School. Three of them are Gryffendor, Ravenclaw and Slytherin. Name the fourth.. Brindlemark

H2.text: In the Harry Potter books there are 4 houses at Hogwarts School. Three of them are Gryffendor, Ravenclaw and Slytherin. Name the fourth.. Llewellyn

H3.text: In the Harry Potter books there are 4 houses at Hogwarts School. Three of them are Gryffendor, Ravenclaw and Slytherin. Name the fourth.. NEWT

A4.text: Hufflepuff values hard work, patience, justice, and loyalty.

A5.text: Hogwarts has four Houses, each named after one of the founders of the school.
